recommendations: Sophia Hibbert ‚ÄúI worked with Elina through the build of a fully flexible (3 statement) business plan model for a manufacturing / healthcare client. I found her very easy to work with - very responsive, fantastic at clearly communicating and understanding the detail behind the complex analysis, and a great person to collaborate with through high pressure deadlines. I hope that we will be able to work together again!‚Äù
